title: 9 millimeter (1997)
description: The suburb that is a society in a society, a place where young guys do anything for respect. A place where criminality and violence is a part of life. The movie is about Malik, a guy without family and land of origin, and who has made crime and violence to a part of his life. Both to win respect, and to support himself. Written by Mikael Svardh <m95_svl@m.kth.se>
